prop.name: urlTemplate
prop.desc: An url template (RFC6570) that will be used to construct the target of the execution of the action.

prop.name: actionApplication
prop.desc: An application that can complete the request.

prop.name: application
prop.desc: An application that can complete the request.

prop.name: actionPlatform
prop.desc: The high level platform(s) where the Action can be performed for the given URL. To specify a specific application or operating system instance, use actionApplication.

prop.name: httpMethod
prop.desc: An HTTP method that specifies the appropriate HTTP method for a request to an HTTP EntryPoint. Values are capitalized strings as used in HTTP.

prop.name: encodingType
prop.desc: The supported encoding type(s) for an EntryPoint request.

prop.name: contentType
prop.desc: The supported content type(s) for an EntryPoint response.
